"A.P.241/10/3":
"...And so I made an excuse for you
this time around."

"However, even if you're a Guardian,
you still need to submit to regular
medical checks. You understand this,
right Matoi?"

"You may think this is a joke,
<%me>, but the same
goes for you too! Don't abuse your
position as Guardians."

"So <%me> and Second Generation
have a role that is different
than Gi and Ri."

"What happened with them that got
them that?"

"It was a series of amazing battles
against Darkers over a long period
of time!"

"Well, I wasn't born at that time,
so I haven't witnessed it myself."

"Hey Xiera, do you have something
that holds a record of those two's
achievements?"

"I would like to see what happened
to ARKS after I died. I feel like
I could get a good impression from
just reviewing your records."
"I don't expect that we even hav--"

"<%me>'s experiences were
so valuable, I just had to create
a database regarding it!"

"However, I haven't gotten to
organizing it with <%me> yet,
so I'm not certain on what actions
are accurate..."

"So <%me>, let's look back
on your history together."

"We can sort through this information,
and I'll get to see what happened
after I passed. It'll be great!"
